LanguageData.EdiblesHigh.stages.0.label: 沉迷大麻食品
LanguageData.EdiblesHigh.stages.0.description: 天哪.这是我吃过最好吃的食物了
LanguageData.EdiblesWithdrawal.stages.1.label: 大麻食物戒断
LanguageData.EdiblesWithdrawal.stages.1.description: 谁把那些布朗尼都吃了？
LanguageData.AdvancedEdiblesHigh.stages.0.label: 十分沉迷大麻食物
LanguageData.AdvancedEdiblesWithdrawal.stages.1.label: 高阶大麻食物戒断
LanguageData.AdvancedEdiblesWithdrawal.stages.1.descr: ...求求你...我还要...再给我吃一点...
